TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Quaternion extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 結構，表示在三個維度中的旋轉。

span.span: Structure that represents a rotation in three dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 四元數可讓您套用至物件，藉此輕易地計算旋轉的平滑動畫的旋轉轉換之間進行插補。Quaternions allow you to interpolate between rotation transformations applied to an object, thereby making it easier to compute smooth animations of rotations. 四元數表示座標軸的旋轉和繞著該軸的旋轉。A quaternion represents an axis of rotation and a rotation around that axis. 您可以個別定義的軸和旋轉物件的開始和結束位置的旋轉角度，但該物件在動畫的中間位置會具有計算不確定性。It's possible to individually define the axis and angle of rotation of the starting and ending positions of a rotated object ,but the intermediate positions of that object during an animation are computationally uncertain. 藉由判斷表示原始方向的 3d 物件，表示其目的方向的另一個四元數，您可以順暢進行插補這些方向之間。By determining a quaternion that represents the original orientation of a 3-D object and one that represents its destination orientation, you can smoothly interpolate between those orientations. 中的值之間的分隔符號，XAML可以是逗號或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些文化特性可以使用逗號字元作為十進位分隔符號，而不是句號字元。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. XAML 處理而異的文化特性為 EN-US，在大部分的 XAML 處理器實作中，預設值，並預期為小數分隔符號的期間。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 您應該避免使用逗號字元作為十進位分隔符號，如果指定在 XAML 中，因為會將衝突的字串類型轉換成其元件屬性值。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into its components. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` -or- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *x**x* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. *y**y* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. *z**z* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. *w**w* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. ## Examples [!code-xaml[animation3dgallery_snip#QuaternionAnimationExampleInline2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Animation3DGallery_snip/CS/QuaternionAnimationExample.xaml#quaternionanimationexampleinline2)] [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn4)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks （x，y，z） 軸和角度旋轉 theta`w`值四元數是：For the axis (x, y, z) and angle of rotation theta, the `w` value for the quaternion is: w = cos(theta/2)w = cos(theta/2) 請注意，如果您使用建構函式，第四個參數值為一角度，以度為單位，並為您執行 w 的計算。Note that if you use the constructor, the fourth parameter is the angle, in degrees, and the w calculation is performed for you.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 球面線性插補適合用來以動畫顯示 3d 的模型，因為它會提供不同的方向的模型之間的平滑轉換。Spherical linear interpolation is useful for animating a three-dimensional models because it provides smooth transitions between different orientations of the model.

param.span: 布林值，指出是否計算四元數來構成四維單位球體上的最短弧形。

span.span: Boolean that indicates whether to compute quaternions that constitute the shortest possible arc on a four-dimensional unit sphere.

summary.span: 表示為的方向間進行插補使用球面線性插補。

span.span: Interpolates between orientations, represented as structures, using spherical linear interpolation.

returns.span: 表示由於插補而產生的方向。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 球面線性插補適合用來以動畫顯示 3d 的模型，因為它會提供不同的方向的模型之間的平滑轉換。Spherical linear interpolation is useful for animating a three-dimensional models because it provides smooth transitions between different orientations of the model.
